title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Chemometrics Simulation: Learner Control vs. Adaptive Program Control

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemical equations and unit conversion concepts
context.additional_context: Simulation environment configuration for enhancing practical skills in chemical metrology, providing immersive learning experiences through VR equipment

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four stoichiometry concept rules (mole-mass, mass-mole, mole-mole, mass-mass conversions) with 90% accuracy.
Learners autonomously solve at least 20 practice problems in simulation environments to enhance concept application skills.
Learners can solve stoichiometry problems occurring in real work environments with 80% accuracy through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
